Sentencas: Improving the power density of solid oxide fuel cell stacks would significantly enhance this technology for transportation.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Using a monolithic structure to downsize the stack dimension offers a key to elevate the power density of solid oxide fuel cell stacks.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: This innovative design is promising but manufacturing is a challenge.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: The monolith is co-sintered in one firing step, and the gas channels are formed by burning off sacrificial organic materials.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Structure distortion or fracture was observed in post-mortem investigations.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: In this work a multiscale, multiphysics modelling approach is proposed to describe and resolve this challenge in the debinding process occurring in a monolithic stack, i.e. the burning of organics and transportation of gases through the gradually opening microstructure, as well as the pressure build-up in the microstructure due to gas development.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Simulation results show that a prominent pressure peak is experienced in the stack when a plasticiser (polyethylene glycol) and a pore-former (polymethyl methacrylate) are decomposed simultaneously.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: To reduce the high pressures, we investigate two possible strategies: (i) changing the mixture of organic additives; (ii) modifying the debinding temperature profile.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Three tapes with different pore-formers are prepared, and the generated pressures during debinding of the three stacks are compared.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: The corresponding stack shapes after debinding are recorded.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Numerical investigations show a good agreement with the post-mortem observations.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: By changing the composition of organics the distortion or fracturing of the stack can be avoided.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: Furthermore, to facilitate stack manufacturing, the high pressures can also be reduced by adjusting the heating rates and dwell temperatures of debinding.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model

Sentencas: By using the new temperature profile suggested by the simulation study, the duration of debinding can also be reduced.
Titulo: Mitigating distortions during debinding of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cell stack using a multiscale, multiphysics model
